mapper.sql: SUB_CODE, SUB_NAME, SUB_CODE_1ST, SUB_NAME_1ST, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY
mapper.select:
select
from TCOR_CFG_SUBDICT where SUB_CODE like #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and upper(SUB_NAME) like #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
select count(1) from TCOR_CFG_SUBDICT where SUB_CODE = #{subCode}

select
from TCOR_CFG_SUBDICT where SUB_CODE = #{subCode} for update
mapper.update:
update TCOR_CFG_SUBDICT
SUB_NAME = #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_CODE_1ST = #{subCode1st,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_NAME_1ST = #{subName1st,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SUB_CODE = #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
